title: Any idea I can change into this name?
body: I want it to change my like this (Ràà) does oce allows this or is there a other way because when I check it it always shows this isn't available. But hardly anyone has that name so needing help

replies.body:
Hey there,

Head on over to the [Summoner Name FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ#h1q4) for information regarding allowed characters in summoner names per region.

> NA/OCE –

>0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz
